description.p: The Fusion Field Reader module reads an ASCII file containing fusion data. This module is primarily a test module for the Fusion package.

The Fusion Field Reader reads an ASCII file and output the following three fields if data present in the file. Pressure, Temperature, Magnetic, Velosity. The format of the data uses a keyword token followed by zero or more values and is as follows:
Field layout (token = FIELDS 'number of fields' 'field descriptor' ...)
Dimensions and end condition (token = DIMENSIONS token = REPEATED or SINGULAR dim dim dim)

The field descriptors may be in any order but the grid should be first followed by the data. The descriptors may as follows: GRID_R_Z_PHI, BFIELD_R_Z_PHI, VFIELD_R_Z_PHI, PRESSURE, TEMPERATURE. With vector data the field may in X-Y-Z, R-Z-PHI, or R-PHI-Z.
